biotools.summary: ContactGAN is a tool for protein contact map refinement for Improving structure prediction using Generative Adversarial Networks. ContactGAN takes a predicted protein contact map as input and outputs a new contact map that better captures the residue-residue contacts.

bioschemas.name: ContactGAN
bioschemas.summary: ContactGAN is a tool for protein contact map refinement for Improving structure prediction using Generative Adversarial Networks. ContactGAN takes a predicted protein contact map as input and outputs a new contact map that better captures the residue-residue contacts.
